item.title: Dragon Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

So I just added specs to my Dragon claws, and it works and everything, but it takes too much of the spec away, close to 76% of the spec, and I only want it to take out 50%. This is the code I added…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 50){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }

and

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 50){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

Also, it lets me put on shields when I wear them, and I don’t understand how to change that…

Read full topic
